content.value:
My family's having to open our small shop bizness today & our worrying of 1. hoping for customers & 2. stressing about the logistics of a crowd, is beyond description. 

Our WFH tech jobs are a privilege, so you better know I will do *whatever* to extend this cushion to others.
content.html: My family's having to open our small shop bizness today & our worrying of 1. hoping for customers & 2. stressing about the logistics of a crowd, is beyond description. Our WFH tech jobs are a privilege, so you better know I will do *whatever* to extend this cushion to others.
